imgDesc.text:
These ancient underground ruins left by the Khaenri'ahns rely on a mysterious energy control system to operate.
A series of many energy relays provide energy to it, and some parts have ceased operation due to the effect of the Gray Crystals...

<color=#ffe14b>Rotate the Mixer</color> to <color=#ffe14b>change</color> the <color=#ffe14b>flow direction</color> of the energy on the circuit. Some Mixers that are not bolted down to the energy circuit can also move along it.
When energy is routed to the control device, you can activate and use the corresponding facilities.
